meanings.definition: Regarded with great respect and reverence.
meanings.sent1: The ancient temple was acred by all who visited.
meanings.sent2: The acred book was kept safe in a special case.

meanings.definition: To make something sacred or holy.

meanings.definition: A place or object that is considered holy or dedicated to a specific purpose.
meanings.sent1: The ancient ruins were a sacred acred to the locals.
